message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this unique product for sale. I think you'll really appreciate its value. I'm willing to let it go for $20000. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I'm looking to save some money on this product. I'm willing to pay $18000 for it. Can you consider my offer?
I appreciate your offer, Bob, but I was thinking more along the lines of $19500. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit on this sale. What do you think?
I understand your concerns, Alice, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $18500 for the product. Can you consider my offer?

I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I can do $19000, but that's as low as I can go. I really think this product is worth it to you, and I'm willing to meet you at this price. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $19000, Alice, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to pay $18750 for the product. Can you consider my offer?

I'm not willing to go any lower than $19000, Bob. I think we've been negotiating for a while, and I'm starting to think it's time to consider other buyers. I'm willing to meet you at $19000, but that's it. What do you think?
